title: Curtis Samuel - Wikipedia
snippet: He was named the 2013 New York Gatorade Player of the Year and was invited to All-American Bowl. A 4-star running-back recruit, Samuel committed to play college football for the Ohio State Buckeyes. He contributed in the 2014â€“2016 seasons under head coach Urban Meyer.

title: Curtis Samuel - Buffalo Bills Wide Receiver - ESPN
snippet: View the profile of Buffalo Bills Wide Receiver Curtis Samuel on ESPN. Get the latest news, live stats and game highlights.

title: Curtis Samuel Profile - Bio, Game Log, Career Stats, Draft, College, News & Videos
snippet: He scored his first career touchdown against the New York Giants. Samuel then joined the Washington Commanders in 2021 and is currently playing with them. Carolina Panthers and Washington Commanders are the teams that he has played for so far in his professional playing career.

title: Curtis Samuel's Contract Breakdown, Salary Cap Details, Bonuses, Terms & More
snippet: Q. Which NFL teams has Curtis Samuel played for? - + A. Curtis Samuel has played for the Carolina Panthers (2017-2020), Washington Commanders (2021-2023), and Buffalo Bills. Q. How tall is Curtis Samuel? - + A. Curtis Samuel stands 5 feet 11 inches, or 180 cm, tall.

title: Curtis Samuel (WR): Bio, News, Stats & more
snippet: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen unbelievably scrambles in circles away from the entire Miami Dolphins defense for an INSANE 21-yard pass to to wide receiver Curtis Samuel.
